left.question: Am I eligible to participate?
left.answer: Anyone can participate! As long as you are at least 14 years old, are a student, and are interested in the world of technology, you can apply! Graduates and Industry professionals cannot be hackers, but we welcome you to join us as a Mentor, Judge or Speaker!

left.question: How many people can be on a team?
left.answer: You can form teams of up to 4 people. There are no restrictions for who they can be, so you can team up with hackers from any school, country, or experience level. Teams can be formed before or during the event.

left.question: When and how will I hear back about my application?
left.answer: All acceptance emails + verification emails have been sent out! Check your spam, trash and all folders if you can’t find it in your inbox.

right.question: How much does it cost to attend GryphHacks?
right.answer: Admission to GryphHacks is completely free! We will provide all the resources and mentorship our hackers need to build something incredible.

right.question: How will communication work?
right.answer: Prior to the event, we’ll be sharing updates on our socials! Keep an eye on our Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn, and through our mailing list. During the event, you’ll get live updates and announcements through our Discord server.

right.question: Is GryphHacks virtual or in-person this year
right.answer: This year, GryphHacks will run fully virtually! Although we were super excited to welcome everyone to the University of Guelph to meet and collaborate with everyone in-person, the health and safety of our hackies, mentors, and judges remain our top priority.
